title: Cyber Security Basics
audio_text: This slide discusses the fundamental principles of cybersecurity

title: What is Cyber Security?

text: The practice of protecting systems, networks, and programs from digital attacks
Aims to defend against unauthorized access, data breaches, and damage

audio_text: This slide showcases the beauty and majesty of wildlife.

title: TTypes of Cyber Threats

text: Phishing: Fraudulent attempts to acquire sensitive information via email or messages.
Social Engineering: Manipulating individuals into revealing confidential information.
Denial-of-Service (DoS) Attacks: Overloading a system to disrupt its services.
Phishing: Fraudulent attempts to acquire sensitive information via email or messages.

audio_text: This slide focuses on the technological advancements of the modern era.

title: Basic Principles of Cyber Security

text: Integrity: Ensuring that information is accurate and has not been tampered with..
Confidentiality: Ensuring that only authorized individuals can access sensitive data.

audio_text: This slide focuses on the technological advancements of the modern era.

title: Conclusion
